turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to order some pizzas form Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need three medium pizzas, all with thick crust. And I want a pepperoni. I want a supreme. And I want a sausage.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 3 thick crust pizzas, 1 supreme, 1 pepperoni, and 1 sausage, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and they are all medium size.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your total will be $57, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and will you be dining in, picking up, or having it delivered?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready in 30 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?
